info.description: This is a Sociomile application server with authentication.
info.title: Sociomile API

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password
Generate a new JWT token using existing token
Register a new user with email, password and name
Create a new conversation with an organization (Guest user)
Create a new message in a conversation
post.summary: Create a message in a conversation

get.description: Retrieve all conversations for the authenticated user (guest or staff)
Retrieve all tickets for a conversation
Retrieve a conversation by its ID

post.description: Assign a conversation to a staff member (Organization Owner only)

get.description: Retrieve all messages for a conversation

put.description: Update the status of a conversation

get.description: Retrieve list of organizations with pagination support

post.description:
Create a new organization with owner (Super Admin only)
Type "Bearer {your token}" to authorize
Create a new organization with owner (Super Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve an organization by its ID
Get statistics for an organization (conversations, tickets)
Retrieve all conversations for an organization (Owner/Staff only)
Retrieve all tickets for an organization (Owner/Staff only)

post.description: Create a new ticket from a conversation

get.description: Retrieve a ticket by its ticket number
Retrieve a ticket by its ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
